topic.title: Handling Exceptions and other Errors with the Node.js SDK in Couchbase

body.p: When an operation fails, its callback will be invoked with a non-empty error argument.

section.title: Anatomy of an Error object
section.p: When an operation fails, its callback will be invoked with a non-empty error argument. An Error object contains a message property which provides a textual description of the message as well as a code property which contains the actual error code.
